item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients (crème de violette optional).
  2. Serve in cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with cocktail cherry.

item.title: Caipirinha
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml cachaça
  • 1/2 lime
  • 15 ml sugar syrup

Instructions

  1. Muddle quartered lime and syrup in a rocks glass.
  2. Add ice and cachaça and stir.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 10 ml sugar syrup
  • lime zest
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients including lime zest.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a lime slice.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Shake with ice.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass
  3. Garnish with lime slice.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

  1. Crush ice in clean tea towel.
  2. Lightly clap mint.
  3. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass.
  4. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water.
  5. Garnish with a mint sprig.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) orange or lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a rocks glass over ice.
  3. Garnish with a twist.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Dry shake ingredients.
  2. Then shake with ice.
  3. Serve in a rocks glass without ice.
  4. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes creole bitters
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Stirred.
  3. Serve in a rocks glass without ice.
  4. Garnish with a lemon twist.

item.title: Southside
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1 mint sprig
  • (garnish) 1 mint leaf

Instructions

  1. Shaken (without mint).
  2. Rolled (with mint).
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with mint leaf.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon slice

Instructions

  1. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine.
  2. Add soda water to halfway up glass.
  3. Fill glass with ice.
  4. Garnish with lemon slice.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Dry shake ingredients.
  2. Then shake with ice and double strain.
  3. Serve in a rocks glass over fresh ice.
  4. Garnish with orange twist and cocktail cherry.
